items.title: New Consulting Contracts in Texas Will Muzzle Authors and Harm Students
items.description: New discriminatory contracts in one Texas Educational Service Center will deny authors, students, and educators inclusive opportunities.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for February 2, 2026
items.description: An unlikely coven, major chemistry in the minor leagues, a fantasy take on Antony and Cleopatra, and more of today's best book deals.

items.title: 7 Must-Read YA Books by Latine Authors
items.description: These YA books by Latina authors cover a range of genres: a contemporary mystery, a historical romance, a swashbuckling fantasy, and more.

items.title: 6 Romantic YA Dystopian Books that Prove Love at the End of the World is Possible
items.description: These romantic YA dystopian novels prove that love really can persevere, even when everything else comes crashing down.

items.title: 6 Comics and Graphic Novels for Fans of Studio Ghibli films
items.description: However you like your Studio Ghibli movies, you’re sure to find a comic or graphic novel in this collection that appeals to you.
